study.name: ZYN Nicotine Pouch Study
study.description: Evaluate impact of ZYN nicotine pouch flavors on cigarette usage

messaging.greeting: You may be a good fit for studies we're running.
messaging.disqualification: Thanks for your time. At the moment, we don't have a study match based on your responses. If anything changes, our team may reach out.
messaging.anti_coaching: I can't help you change answers to qualify. I can only record what's true and help schedule a call if you're eligible.
messaging.pin_failure: I'm unable to confirm your identity right now. I'll transfer this to a member of our team to help you continue.

questions.question: Are you able to read, understand, and willing to sign an informed consent form and complete questionnaires written in English?
Are you willing to complete a remote visit every two weeks using our eResearch application?
Do you own a smart phone with text message and data capabilities compatible with necessary surveys?
Do you intend to use an FDA-approved treatment for nicotine dependence (i.e., Nicotine gum, patch, lozenge, etc.) within the next 4 months?
If you use cigars, how often do you smoke cigars?
Do you currently use nicotine pouches?
How many years have you smoked cigarettes?
How many days a week do you smoke cigarettes?
How many cigarettes do you smoke on a typical day?
Do you currently smoke marijuana or use any marijuana products?

follow_up.question: What forms of marijuana do you use?
How long have you been smoking marijuana?
How frequently do you use marijuana?
What is your reason for marijuana use?

questions.question: Have you participated in a research study within the last 30 days?
Is anyone living in your household screening for, participating in, or has participated in this study?
Are you pregnant, nursing, or trying to become pregnant?
Are you willing to use a form of contraception acceptable to the PI from the time of the screening visit until the end of the study?
Please list any current or past serious medical or psychiatric conditions.
Please list any prescriptions, over the counter medications, and supplements you are taking or have taken in the last 30 days.
